revised_title: Generalized Plane Stress in a Semi-Infinite Strip: Analytical Solution and Numerical Evaluation
tldr: The authors present an analytical solution for determining the generalized plane stress in a semi-infinite strip under arbitrary end-load. They expand the stress function in a series of non-orthogonal eigenfunctions and use orthogonal functions to satisfy boundary conditions. The method is illustrated through four examples, demonstrating the application of St. Venant's principle to the strip.
